author: Robert Hazelby
message:
Many thanks for taking the time to not only dig this out of your archives, but put the effort into making an English language conversion, too.

I've given the game a plug here: http://amigagamer.blogspot....

Hopefully it'll bring you a few more visitors.

Great work!

replies.message: If I am not mistaken, Plouf! was distributed by FDS - Free Distribution Software. I have a .adf for what was then a "full version" of Plouf! Is this what you mean with "the original French version"?

replies.message:
This is indeed what I was talking about. If you can share this version "original", I would be happy ;-)
